Topic.Title: String lists not updating in UI [BUG]

Posts.EditableText:
I have a string list as an attribute in a room, and have just edited its contents. The contents as shown in the list box at the bottom are correct, but I've found that there's a persistent problem with the comma-separated compacted version of the string list in the list of attributes box.

My room Attributes panel (lower half) looks like this:-

```
Attributes      +Add Add Change Script  X Delete
----------------------------------------------------------------------
| fetchables      access_card_standard, wep_pipe, email_rebecca_1    |       <-(highlighted)
----------------------------------------------------------------------

[String List v]
+ Add [] Edit  X Delete
-----------------------------------
| wep_pipe                        |
| mod_sys_analyser_1              |
| mod_nav_map_unit_1              |
-----------------------------------
```
As you can see, the two are completely different.  I've quite often seen the comma-separated-version to be blank after creating the string list, so it looks like the hook (or whatever) that updates that list in the middle list box isn't firing properly when you edit the list of items in the bottom list box.
